profile.name: Shakir Gulzar
profile.headline: Aspiring Cyber Security Professional
profile.summary: Aspiring cybersecurity professional actively seeking a technical security role. Focused on developing practical skills in threat detection, incident analysis, vulnerability discovery, and attack-defense techniques across applications and systems.

training.name: 100xDevs – Full Stack MERN Certification
training.notes: Completed structured training in web technologies with emphasis on understanding application architecture and security-relevant components.

training.name: SOC Analyst Learning Path
training.notes: Completed Tier 1 SOC analyst training focused on hands-on investigation, covering cyber kill chain concepts and MITRE ATT&CK, with practical experience in phishing email analysis, malware analysis fundamentals, and detection of web-based attacks using simulated lab environments.

certifications.name: Certified Cybersecurity Educator Professional (CCEP)
certifications.notes: Validated expertise across core cybersecurity domains including network security, security architecture, IAM, offensive and defensive security, cloud security, application security, SOC operations, and incident response.

certifications.name: Hack The Box – Certified Defensive Security Analyst (CDSA)
certifications.notes: Training focused on SOC operations, detection engineering fundamentals, log analysis, and incident response methodologies.

projects.name: SOC Incident Investigations (TryHackMe SOC Simulator)
projects.description: Conducted SOC-style incident investigations by analyzing alerts, logs, and attacker behavior to triage phishing, malware, and suspicious activity.

projects.name: PoC Port: CVE-2025-32463 to Rust
projects.description: Ported a known local privilege escalation PoC for CVE-2025-32463 to Rust to deepen understanding of Linux privilege escalation and exploit construction.

projects.name: Rust TCP Port Scanner
projects.description: Built a multi-threaded TCP port scanner in Rust to identify open ports on target hosts and practice networking fundamentals, concurrency, and reconnaissance techniques.

experience.title: Cloud Server Security (Microsoft Azure)
experience.notes: Deployed and secured a public-facing game server by implementing firewall rules, access controls, and basic DDoS mitigation to maintain availability and protect against common threats.

programming.title: Programming & Scripting
programming.notes: Proficient in these languages with experience using them for security tooling, exploit analysis, automation, and system-level inspection.

footer.statusLine: Status: Online | Mode: OPSEC-aware | Logs: Enabled
footer.disclaimer: All testing performed with explicit authorization.
